The results of my third voyage in the Midge (the 1st 2 ran out of fuel before orbital insertion).

I ran out of oxidizer after I had my PE at 37 km or so, and I finished circularizing on RCS. Even though the RCS is on the bottom of the craft the SAS keeps it exceptionally stable. I should be able to deorbit without much trouble.

There's no MechJeb on the craft file by default, and I flew without MJ, as always.

EDIT: I like the craft. It's stable during VTOL (although it took a little bit of stabilization at takeoff) and RCS maneuvers, both of which I was unsure of, and it can in fact get to orbit, even if it's tough to do manually. There's a lot of air intakes clipped onto each other which I don't like to do when I build ships, but the craft works and looks nice too.

Nicely built craft, and the smallest SSTO I've ever flown.
